column2: what all the other reviews have said is true. We had to wait about 25 minutes to be seated
column3: but it was absolutely worth it. The food was fresh and came out quickly
column4: our service was extremely fast and attentive. My friend had the ramen special & I had the Old School
column5: we shared edamame and wasabi peas. Everything was great. The prices were quite reasonable. I hope to eat here next time I'm in town
